original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3371)@</color>激發自身血性，使用武器對周圍敵人進行五次攻擊，每次以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3371)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害，同時回復自身的2%的體力值。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3371)@</color> to stimulate blood, use weapons to attack surrounding enemies five times, each time with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3371)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage on the enemy and restores 2% of its own physical strength.
